title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields are displayed as text fields instead of labels.
EB: The fields on the Project Properties Info page should be displayed as labels instead of text fields. It is expected that the fields are readonly. This way, the values cannot be edited by the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the Project Properties Info page on any motif platform and observe that the fields are displayed as text fields.
